A Celebration of Kathak

Stillness & movement, power & grace, rhythm

& silence: translated into visual

geometries and the sculpting of space.

An Acapella With Bodies

Musical rhythms looped over a consistent

metronome to create intricate sounds,

followed by a fusion of 4 dance forms.

Two Rivers of Movement

Some follow a straight path, others meander

gracefully. How would these two distinct

bodies come together?
